column1: Enhancing Skills of Sri Lankan Tour Guides
Assessment of Future Requirements of Skills/Service Level
Further, the framework will explore the changes required for TGs' skills and competencies to
cater to the future requirements of tourists visiting Sri Lanka. Based on the current level of
skills  and  competencies  and  touristsâ€™  satisfaction  with  the  current  service  levels,  future
requirements and improvements will be determined using this research framework.
